item.title: PixAI Experience
item.description: So there I was, scrubbing through Play Store and found this app. It’s an AI image generator that specializes on anime art. Then I saw in the top that there is no indicator of “Contains ads” or “In-app purchases”. None of them. Initially I was a bit suspicious, but I decided to try it out anyway. First glance, there are content. Then, the login. Back then, they were still using embedded webpage to perform the login.
